name: Trijam 176: Loading Process
description:
Made in about 2 and a half hours for Trijam 176. The theme was Loading Process.

You must sort the packages into the correct trucks by color. Each truck can only hold five packages, so you must click/tap it to send it off for a few seconds. When it comes back, it will be ready for more packages. Sometimes you might need to send off a truck before its full, if you know you won't need to put something in it for awhile.

The package art was done by Kronbits, and the trucks and audio is by Kenney.

I hope you enjoy!

(Made with Godot)
